chimera.translation[0].definitions[0].de: something, especially an idea or hope, that is not really possible and can never exist
chimera.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: trying to present that chimera, ‘a balanced view’
chimera.translation[0].definitions[1].de: an imaginary creature that breathes fire and has a lion’s head, a goat’s body, and a snake’s tail
chimera.translation[0].definitions[2].de: a living thing that contains cells from another living thing
